headline: PPG recognized in Newsweek’s World’s Greenest Companies 2025 list
summary: PITTSBURGH, May 27, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that it has been named to Newsweek magazine’s World’s Greenest Companies 2025 list. The list recognizes the top 750 publicly listed companies across 26 countries for their environmental sustainability performance.
